pages.title: Deliver Items
pages.text: Send your companion to deliver items to a bookmarked location or specific coordinates.$(br2)$(li)$(bold)deliver_items$() — Companion walks to the destination and drops items$(li)Works with bookmarked locations: $(thing)"Deliver 32 cobblestone to my base"$(li)Or coordinates: $(thing)"Deliver the iron ingots to 100, 64, 200"$(br2)Earns $(bold)15 XP$() per delivery.$(br2)Tip: Bookmark important locations first with $(thing)"Remember this spot as 'my base'"$() for easy reference.

pages.title: Villager Trading
pages.text: The companion can interact with nearby villagers:$(br2)$(bold)List trades:$()$(br)$(thing)"What trades are available?"$(br)→ Shows all villager trades within range$(br2)$(bold)Execute a trade:$()$(br)$(thing)"Trade 10 emeralds for a diamond pickaxe"$(br)→ Companion walks to the villager and trades$(br2)Earns $(bold)10 XP$() per trade. The companion uses items from its own inventory for payment.
